newsitem.title: CROATIA: Croatia Oct RPI rises to 0.6 pct, 3.2 pct y/y.
newsitem.headline: Croatia Oct RPI rises to 0.6 pct, 3.2 pct y/y.

text.p: The Central Bureau of Statistics issued the following economic indicator details.
CROATIA RETAIL PRICES OCTOBER SEPTEMBER OCT '95
-- Between January and October retail prices rose a total of 2.9 percent or an average 0.286 percent per month.
Croatia introduced a radical anti-inflation programme in October 1993, when monthly inflation hit 38.7 percent.
